page.title: 15LYDFORD C.P. SCHOOL
page.content: Lydford School is 107 years old.There are two classes,the infant class containing 14 and the junior 16,making a total of 30,so our school is quite small. We have a small garden but it is going to be enlarged.The parents have raised money to buy the garden and a small swimming pool which is used in the summer to teach the children to swim. At dinner time there is a canteen and Mrs.Ferrier-Kerr cooks the food for us. The infant teacher is called Mrs Martyn and the teacher for the older children is called Mr Tremain. Sometimes we go to a school called Lewtrenchard or they come here.We play soft ball cricket,rounders,football and net ball.We also go to Bridestowe for singing and music.Last week we had a concert with the other two schools.
